title: Avocado, tomato and mango salsa
ingredients: ['1 mango - peeled, stone removed and diced', '1 avocado - peeled, stone removed and diced', '4 medium tomatoes, diced', '1 fresh green chilli, seeded and minced', 'small bunch fresh coriander, chopped', '3 cloves garlic, minced', '1 teaspoon salt', '2 tablespoons fresh lime juice', '1/2 small red onion, chopped', '3 tablespoons extra-virgin olive oil']
